name: 劳伦斯·普尔曼
name_full: 劳伦斯·普尔曼 Lawrence Perlman
introduction: Dr. Lawrence Perlman, a clinical psychologist and researcher in the twin study of the interaction between nature and nurture wrote that the "adoptive parents, entering into a contract with the Louise Wise Services, were guaranteed that they would not know anything about the family background of their infants, including the possible existence of biological siblings.".
